short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ACQUIRED helps you discover personalized fashion recommendations based on your social media activity, style, budget and size.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THINK SHOPPING CANT GET ANY BETTER? THINK AGAIN.

ACQUIRED is an AI-powered fashion assistant that analyzes your social media and shopping preferences to offer personalized clothing and accessory recommendations. Whether you're shopping for a new outfit or looking to refresh your wardrobe, ACQUIRED makes it easy to find the perfect pieces.

Key Features:

- Personalized fashion recommendations based on your size, budget, and life-style.
- Easy integration with your social media accounts (Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok)
- Multiple cart checkout (see all items you’ve added to cart simultaneously)
- Multiple profile sign in (shop for mom, dad, significant other, kids and yourself)
- Access to exclusive deals from top brands and retailers (coming soon)
- Outfit Creation (decide which items you’ll take home by knowing how you’ll wear them)
- Intuitive Sizing Recommendations: No more pictures or annoying size charts, shop immediately at the stores you love or new ones by just letting us know your usual size (AQ takes care of the rest)
- Simple, streamlined shopping experience. You save time by getting exactly what you want without endless scrolling.

We've experienced the frustration of endless shopping trips, only to end up settling for clothes that don't fit or flatter us. By offering a personalized shopping experience, we aim to inspire people to embrace their unique style and see their potential, while supporting you through life’s transitions, from heartbreaks to job interviews, ensuring every purchase brings joy and confidence.

With ACQUIRED, we hope you feel empowered to embrace your potential and create a wardrobe that tells your story.

Shop Smarter, Not Harder... Download now!
